summary: Website for AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES, a scrap trading company dealing in all types of scrap. Owner: Bhupendra Singh Chandel
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional logo for AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES scrap trading company with industrial/recycling theme incorporating company initials or relevant iconography (logo.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that displays the company name 'AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES' prominently with a tagline about scrap trading services
Create an 'About Us' section that includes information about the company owner Bhupendra Singh Chandel and the company's focus on trading all types of scrap
Create a 'Services' or 'Scrap Types' section that lists the various types of scrap materials the company trades in (e.g., metal scrap, paper scrap, plastic scrap, electronic scrap, etc.)
Create a contact section with a form or contact information display for potential customers to reach AKANKSHA ENTERPRISES
Implement a clean, professional visual theme appropriate for a B2B scrap trading business with earthy, industrial colors and clear typography that conveys trust and reliability
Update the contact section to display phone numbers 8329880055 and 9765729905, email b11082004@gmail.com, and address 'Nagpur Narendra Nagar, pincode 440015' in the contact information cards
